tasks.taskName: Create React project and public repo

aspects.description: React app correctly set in the root of the repo.

feedbacks.whatWentWell: Nicely done, project setup correctly. Code away!
feedbacks.evenBetterIf: Make sure to move app files out of any nested folder created by create-react-app. Otherwise, this will be a pain when we get to seeding!

aspects.description: CORS enabled following the backend hosting guide.

feedbacks.whatWentWell: CORS setup correctly to allow for frontend to backend communication, well done
feedbacks.evenBetterIf: Ensure to follow the specific steps mentioned in the BE hosting guide for enabling CORS.

aspects.description: Mobile-first wireframes and component trees are well-defined.

feedbacks.whatWentWell: Wireframes reflect a mobile-first design approach.
feedbacks.evenBetterIf: Cover all planned pages in wireframe with clear flow.

aspects.description: Distinction between API endpoints for accessing data and page routes is clear.

feedbacks.whatWentWell: API endpoints and frontend paths are correctly distinguished in planning.
feedbacks.evenBetterIf: Check understanding if there seems to be confusion between API endpoints and frontend paths.

aspects.description: Frontend paths for pages well planned.

feedbacks.whatWentWell: Expected frontend paths for each page are specified.
feedbacks.evenBetterIf: Include a clear indication of what API the component data will come from.

aspects.description: List of all articles viewable on the home page or via a dedicated link.

Navigation to article page from all articles list.
Article data fetched from API using article ID in URL.
